⚠️ **This is an experimental API! It is not fully supported, and is likely to change significantly in future versions.**

References a single video frame.

Used to display video frames from a [`archetypes.AssetVideo`](https://rerun.io/docs/reference/types/archetypes/asset_video).

## Components

**Required**: [`VideoTimestamp`](../components/video_timestamp.md)

**Optional**: [`EntityPath`](../components/entity_path.md)
